entry.title: Enshittification
entry.summary: How to break free of big tech or at least reintroduce competition to force them to be better.
entry.content:
As a designation for a particular phenomenon affecting online platforms, coined by Canadian-British blogger, journalist, and science fiction author Cory Doctorow in 2022.

https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36974082

ABC’s Future Tense podcast interview with Cory Doctorow is quite good and get to the heart of the matter.
